network

Class NetworkPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.NetworkPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player

    public class NetworkPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    Dummy Player for playing over network.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Figure.FigureColor color)
        Description copied from interface: Player
        This method gives the Player the neccesary information, so that the Player can set up itself for the next move.

        Specified by:
        prepare in interface Player
        Parameters:
        color - A variable from the enum FigureColor.

      • requestMove

        public void requestMove()
        Description copied from interface: Player
        This method is called by the gamelogic and should be the method in which the player is calculating his move. It is required that this method calls makeMove in gamelogic with the parameter of the move that the player wants to make.
        Specified by:
        requestMove in interface Player

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Player
        Returns the name of the player.

        Specified by:
        getName in interface Player
        Returns:
        A string of characters that represent the name of the player

      • acceptDraw

        public boolean acceptDraw()
        Description copied from interface: Player
        This method is called in a player if a draw is requested by the other player. This method allows the player to calculate if a draw is a reasonable choice and returns a value with regard to that decision.

        Specified by:
        acceptDraw in interface Player
        Returns:
        A boolean the determines if a requested draw will be accepted by the player.

      • saveInformation

        public void saveInformation(java.lang.String directory)
        Description copied from interface: Player
        Here the player can save its information after the game in a file. It should be saved in the given directory.

        Specified by:
        saveInformation in interface Player
        Parameters:
        directory - A file to a directory.
